oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Henry H. Redkey
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sgt. Henry H. Redkey, Co. I, 89th Ohio Inf., USA, was captured at the Battle of Chickamauga and sent to the prison camp at Andersonville, Ga. Originally "mourned as dead" by his friends, he survived Andersonville, was sent to Annapolis, Md., and then to Camp Chase in Ohio at the end of the war. He later became a member of Ohio General Assembly.
